headline: Jim Cramer on Corning: “This is the Finest Glass Maker in the World”
summary: Corning Incorporated (NYSE:GLW) is one of the noteworthy Q3 stocks Jim Cramer was focused on. Cramer noted that he has been watching the company closely for the Charitable Trust. He said: “When you reach number six of the best performers this quarter, you get to a company that I’ve had my eye on for the […]
